name: 林逾先
objective:
本課程教導學生在管理領域內英文的運用，學生將在本課程裡學習到:
(1)個人英文履歷表的撰寫，(2) 英文會議資料如：議程、動議、記錄等的準備，(3)英文正式文件及電子郵件的撰寫，(4) 英文計劃書與手冊的編寫，(5)管理常見之英文專有名詞的正確用法，及(6) 現代化全球管理的英文專題。學生必須在課堂上就選定的管理題材以英文做簡報及討論。
This course teaches students the use of English within the context of management. Students are expected to learn the followings in English: (1) Write-up of personal curriculum vitae; (2) Preparation of meeting materials such as agenda, motions, minutes, etc.; (3) Appropriate style and writing of official business documents and electronic mails; (4) Development of business proposals and manuals; (5) Correct use of English terminologies in management and (6) Contemporary issues and trend in global management communities. Students are required to make individual presentation with class discussion on the selected management topics in English.
